import React, {useState} from "react"; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; function Header() { const [isShown2, setIsShown2] = useState(false); const [isShown3, setIsShown3] = useState(false); const [isShown4, setIsShown4] = useState(false); const list1 = ['Uno','Due','Tre','Quattro','Cinque','Sei']; const list2 = ['Uno','Due','Tre','Quattro','Cinque','Sei']; const list3 = ['Uno','Due','Tre','Quattro','Cinque','Sei']; const list4 = ['Uno','Due','Tre','Quattro','Cinque','Sei']; const toggleButton = (e) => { const i = e.target; const classes = i.classList; classes.forEach(classe => { if(classe === 'fa-plus-circle') { i.classList.replace(classe,'fa-minus-circle'); } else if(classe === 'fa-minus-circle') { i.classList.replace(classe, 'fa-plus-circle'); } }); console.log(classes); // const button = document.querySelector('') } return (
